title: Orchestrator: env-aware preflight (pack chain)
description: Orchestrator graph that runs capability presets -> env constraints -> prompt gates -> goal execution, with WAIT_USER on env mismatch.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  S[Start] --> P1[pack.tools.capabilities_preset_preflight.v1]
  P1 --> P2[pack.tools.env_constraints.preflight.v1]
  P2 -->|wait_user| W[WAIT_USER]
  W --> P2
  P2 --> P3[pack.tools.prompt_gate.capabilities_aware.v1]
  P3 --> P4[pack.goal_runner.unstoppable.capabilities_aware.v1]
  P4 --> E[End]
